meanings.definition: The number to which another number, the addend, is added.
meanings.sent1: In the math problem, the augends are the numbers being added together.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained that the augends are the numbers we add in an addition problem.
meanings.sent3: The augends at the party were the guests who brought the most gifts.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity were the augends that made her a beloved member of the community.
meanings.sent5: The bright red apples and juicy oranges were the augends that made the fruit basket so appealing.
